title: EMEC successfully demos tidal plus storage and hydrogen integration
description: Hailed as a world first, the demonstration integrated the O2 tidal turbine, vanadium flow batteries, and a 670 kW electrolyzer.
content: Hailed as a world first, the demonstration integrated the O2 tidal turbine, vanadium flow batteries, and a 670 kW electrolyzer.
